amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2014, LB749, § 298. Operative date January 1, 2017. Evidentiary effect of copy of filed document.
amendatorysection.para: A certificate attached to a copy of a document filed by the Secretary of State, bearing his or her signature, which may be in facsimile, and the seal of this state, shall be conclusive evidence that the original document is on file with the Secretary of State.
